Instruction: Slice the baguette into thin rounds and place them on a baking sheet.
Bake the baguette rounds in the preheated oven for 8-10 minutes, or until lightly toasted.
Slice the brie cheese into thin slices.
Once the baguette rounds are toasted, top each with a slice of brie cheese.
Return the baking sheet to the oven and bake for an additional 3-5 minutes, or until the cheese is melted.
Remove from the oven and let cool slightly.
Top each crostini with blackberries, drizzle with honey, and sprinkle with fresh thyme leaves.
Serve warm as an elegant side dish or appetizer.
